content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted various shell commands to activate the arcgis environment, but all returned errors indicating that necessary files could not be found. The latest development shows that none of the attempted commands were successful, with all returning errors indicating that necessary files could not be found. I tried multiple variations of the command to activate the arcgis environment, including using different paths and commands to initialize the bash profile and activate the environment, but all resulted in the same errors indicating that conda could not be found. I attempted to activate the environment using the command "bash -c 'source /home/atlas/miniconda3/bin/activate && conda activate arcgis && echo "Environment activated."'", but received an error indicating that the necessary file could not be found. This command was attempted multiple times, but all attempts resulted in the same error.
"""
